original_title: Valeriy Sokolov: Un Violon Dans l'Ã¢me
overview: This documentary introduces the unbelievable talents of Valeriy Sokolov. A short introduction gives way to concert footage guaranteed to amaze. The repertoire includes Beethoven's 7th Violin sonata, Prokofiev's 2nd sonata, Saint-Saens' Introduction and Rondo Capriccioso, and Miroslav Skorikh's Spanish Danse.
title: Valeriy Sokolov: Natural Born Fiddler
